name: Toast Catch
description:
Toast pops up - you catch it... as much as you can before time runs out. Who'd want to be toastless and timeless? Not me. Featuring loud day-glo graphics and sproingy type noises. It's a toast #punkjam game.

Created with Pocket Code for Android. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.catrobat.catroid

Original version and source code available from https://pocketcode.org/details/3009
